```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(mdsr)
install.packages("textreg")
library(textreg)
library(tm)
```

```{r}
usconstitution_url <-"https://www.usconstitution.net/const.txt"
usconstitution_Raw<-RCurl::getURL(usconstitution_url)
usconstitution<-strsplit(usconstitution_Raw, "\r\n")[[1]]
length(usconstitution)
usconstitution <- usconstitution %>%
  tm_map(removeNumbers)%>%
  tm_map(stripWhitespace)%>%
  tm_map(removePunctuation)%>%
  tm_map(content_transformer(tolower))%>%
  tm_map(removeWords, stopwords("english"))
wordcloud(usconstitution, max.words = 30, scale= c(8,1), colors = topo.colors(n=30), random.color = TRUE)
```
